metadata.title: CVE-2022-3279 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An unhandled exception in job log parsing in GitLab CE/EE affecting allversions prior to 15.2.5, 15.3 prior to 15.3.4, and 15.4 prior to 15.4.1allows an attacker to prevent access to job logs

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
